sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const PopularRestaurants: React.FC = () => { const restaurants = [ { id: 1, name: 'Pizza Palazzo', image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', rating: 4.8, deliveryTime: '25-35 min', deliveryFee: '2.50€', categories: ['Pizza', 'Talianské'] }, { id: 2, name: 'Sushi Master', image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', rating: 4.9, deliveryTime: '30-40 min', deliveryFee: '3.00€', categories: ['Sushi', 'Ázijské'] }, { id: 3, name: 'Burger Kingdom', image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', rating: 4.7, deliveryTime: '20-30 min', deliveryFee: '2.00€', categories: ['Burger', 'Americké'] }, { id: 4, name: 'Zdravé Chute', image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', rating: 4.6, deliveryTime: '35-45 min', deliveryFee: '2.90€', categories: ['Zdravé', 'Saláty'] }, { id: 5, name: 'Pasta Corner', image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', rating: 4.8, deliveryTime: '25-35 min', deliveryFee: '2.50€', categories: ['Pasta', 'Talianské'] }, { id: 6, name: 'Pho Vietnam', image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', rating: 4.7, deliveryTime: '30-40 min', deliveryFee: '2.80€', categories: ['Vietnamské', 'Polievky'] } ]; return (

Populárne reštaurácie

Najlepšie hodnotené reštaurácie vo vašom okolí

{restaurants.map((restaurant) => (
⭐ {restaurant.rating}

{restaurant.name}

{restaurant.categories.map((category) => ( {category} ))}
🕒 {restaurant.deliveryTime} 🚚 {restaurant.deliveryFee}
))}
); }; export default PopularRestaurants;
